price: 37.  Ee ah kuwa ka fogaada denbiyada waaweyn iyo xumaha, markay cadhoodaanna wax iska cafiya.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡتَنِبُونَ كَبَٰٓئِرَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡفَوَٰحِشَ وَإِذَا مَا غَضِبُواْ هُمۡ يَغۡفِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yajtanibūna kabāira al-ith'mi wal-fawāḥisha wa-idhā mā ghaḍibū hum yaghfirūna
